phrases: What time does the competition start?
Uh...the doors open at 3:00... and the thing starts at 3:30.
It is just about to start!
No. 11 was last year's Honorable Mention, huh?
I wonder if she will be able to play well?
That Mr. Kazama's leading the judging panel, huh?
It is a good chance to catch his eye.
You know what, it is like a different dimension in here.
Everyone here is like a celebrity.
This tension before the competition starts is the same everywhere, huh?
Even I am starting to get nervous!
You are not even competing, Tsubaki.
Since I am going this way.
We will be rooting for you, okay?
Towa Music Competition Committee Sponsor Second Annual Towa Music Competition Violin - Middle School Division
It is smaller inside than I thought.
Do not compare it to a stadium!
I have not felt this kind of atmosphere in a while... since sixth grade, when I came to cheer you on.
The dry air... the smell of dust...
Those seats over there are open.
He is all grown up now.
You mean the youngest kid to ever win the Saiki Competition?
But I thought he was overseas?
What is he doing at the Violin Competition?
The classical world sure is small!
Hey, you kept this from me on purpose, did not you?
That we would be going to hear her perform!
If you knew about that, Kousei...
You would not have come, would you?
So I kept it on the down-low with all my might.
So the piano only makes you feel lousy, then?
Towa Music Competition Committee Sponsor Second Annual Towa Music Competition Violin - Middle School Division
We will now begin the preliminary round of the Towa Music Competition
It is been a while since I heard a live performance.
I am really starting to get goosebumps.
It is the same song over and over.
Well, that is the set piece.
And you are the one who brought me here.
But it is a pretty big turnout, huh?
This is a newly-established major national competition that is starting to get some notice.
The sponsors are kind of quirky.
Normally, the set piece for the preliminary round would be Bach or Paganini numbers, played solo,
but in this contest, every number features an accompanist.
The winner gets the right to play on a Guarneri owned by the sponsors in a recital.
Is it just me or does he stink?
And he started off so well, too.
He made two or three mistakes.
Is he one of Mr. Sato's students?
Midway through, he started flailing with his bow.
That was raw, but the overall level was high.
You are absolutely right, Mr. Kazama!
Well, it got interesting after he messed up.
At this rate I am going to fall asleep.
- I have been waiting for this, yo!
Elohim, Essaim... Elohim, Essaim... I implore you...
This is the same song, right?
No question, it is the set piece, the Kreutzer.
Both the tempo and the dynamics are all over the place!
She is even ignoring the pianist and going off on her own!
She might as well be picking a fight with the composer!
It is the Kreutzer... but this piece is no longer Beethoven's.
There is no denying that she owns it.
She is ultra-violent, her personality blows, and she leaves the worst impression.
An overwhelming personality, refusing to blindly obey the composer.
Though I am sure it is not Mr. Kazama's cup of tea...
What she has is on a whole different level.
Kaori Miyazono Sumitani Junior Highschool Previous Awards: None
How on earth is this girl not famous?
They are still buzzing about her.
It is like a concert venue!
This is a competition, after all.
There is no way she will win or even place.
Not playing the way the score's written is a total taboo.
You saw how everyone loved it!
I could see it if this were a recital, but no way in a competition.
That is probably not what she is seeking.
I wonder how she can seem so happy while she is performing?
We will now take a fifteen-minute break.
That No. 4 was totally awesome, huh?
I even know her name now!
I think I am a fan!
They are all talking about Kao-chan.
Well, she was really cool, was not she?
Was not it like we were at a concert?
She was the only one I could stay awake for.
It was beyond lame of you to snooze from the get-go.
Well, I could not help it!
We will be posting the result thirty minutes after the panel's done.
Because I really do not care about that stuff.
It means nothing unless you come in first.
The violinist who just finished performing...
Comes running towards those who await her.
I have never seen anyone get flowers after the prelims.
Not only that, but you do not even know them, right?
They could not have known to bring them, so for those girls...
hearing your performance, then rushing out to buy flowers to give to you...
It must have been an unforgettable day.
I think it was that kind of performance.
Although I only played Friend A.
We will now be announcing the names of the contestants who cleared the preliminaries.
I am going to take a picture.
The Audience Award winner makes it to the second round, too.
Man, you gave me a heart attack.
You were not in the nurse's office, so I came to find you,
and you are passed out on the floor!
Use this to ice the spot where you got clobbered.
What were you up to, ditching class and screaming bloody murder?
I was just clearing my mind.
Well, you are acting pretty strange today.
Even more spaced out than usual.
You were thinking about a girl you like, right?
That pretty much defines the idle thoughts of adolescence, man.
She was so darned cute, huh?
Never in a million years and you know it!
You are in a supporting role.
No way would she ever like me.
But that does not make any difference.
It is only natural for the girl you are crushing on to be in love with someone else.
Since you are in love with her,
That is why people fall so irrationally in love.
I think I kind of get why you are such a chick-magnet, Watari.
There are plenty of girls that I like!
But for me, it is impossible.
Whether or not it is impossible,
the girl will let you know.
You made Keiko cry again, did not you?
What do you mean, calm down?
I was going to ditch practice today and go home with Keiko-chan!
Seeing as I have neglected her for a while.
Against a screen of bright red clouds...
I hear the refrain against the black curtain of my closed eyes.
Over and over... Again and again...
It is like what my mother left me scatters away...
I want to hear it again, yet I do not want to hear it again...
yet I do not want to see her.
What do you call this kind of feeling again?
She is wearing our school uniform.
So you really are a student here.
You were going to sneak another shot, were not you?
I would never, and I did not!
You are going to spread it all over the internet!
I will not, I will not!
It will only make my popularity explode anyway.
I want to scare him, so I am lying in wait.
I was going to ditch practice today and go home with Keiko-chan!
Think he will be here soon?
Nah, no sign of him showing up at all.
Then maybe I will go take a peek at the soccer team.
They have got their summer tournament coming up, see!
I do not know if you should barge in on practice...
I do not think it is a good idea!
Hmm, you do have a point.
If I disrupt him, he will hate me, huh?
I am appointing you as his substitute!
